All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationInterface, SubscriberCallback

BasicNCAPBlock
public abstract class NCAPBlock
extends FunctionBlock

Represents NCAP abstraction from IEEE 1451.1.

perform

public ArgArray perform(java.lang.String server_operation_id,
                        ArgArray server_input_arguments)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from class: FunctionBlock
Handles client-server method invocations. The OpIDs handled by this class are:

  • OpIdConfigure
  • OpIdGetGroupIDs
  • OpIdGetBlockMajorState
  • OpIdGetAllMetaData
  • OpIdGetMetaData

server_input_arguments - contains the incoming parameters
